body:
Hey, everyone!
I recently made a video of a killfarm I participated in on Curabitur. It was quite an exiting, PVP-filled event, and I had a bunch of fun doing it, so I decided to post it here in case anyone was interested.
Enjoy! ^-^
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=lBJtui5UzVU

title: Fun killfarm on Curabitur :3

replies.body: Nice video, I never thought to killfarm on Curabitur! :)
replies.body_tagged: Nice video, I never thought to killfarm on Curabitur! :)

replies.body: Thank you! I don't killfarm often, but I can tell you that killfarming there is a blast ;D
replies.body_tagged: Thank you! I don't killfarm often, but I can tell you that killfarming there is a blast ;D
